definition.de: Vorgang, bei dem Schuld oder Unschuld, richtig oder falsch festgesetzt und geklärt wird
definition.dk: Den retslige procedure, der afgør skyldsspørgsmål og udmåler en evt. straf.
definition.en-GB: The process by which evidence is presented and guilt, innocence or culpability is determined
definition.en-US: The process by which evidence is presented and guilt, innocence or culpability is determined
definition.pt-BR: Processo mediante o qual culpado ou inocente, certo ou errado é determinado e julgado.
definition.pt-PT: Processo mediante o qual se determina e julga a culpa ou a inocência, o certo e o errado.
definition.se: Proceduren då ett rättsfall tas upp i en domstol.
definition.zh-Hans: 判断和决定有罪或无罪，或对或错的过程
